body.name: Car Charger [Apple MFi Certified], 2 Pack 48W Dual Port USB C Car Charger All Metal iPhone Fast Car Adapter with 2x3ft Lightning Cable, PD/QC 4.0 Type C Fast Charging for iPhone/iPad/Airpods and More
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 50 mins
features: ⚡【48W Dual fast charging port】48W PD+QC 4.0 Dual Port PPS Rapid Car Charger is made of metal and can be used comfortably with the car cigarette lighter. This fast charging car charger with an excellent Charger experience, It can charge 2 prevailing phones and E-devices simultaneously anytime and anywhere. You can share with your companions to get rid of worries about the remaining battery power of your phone, Keep Your phone running all day.

⚡【Safety & Anti-interference】: Certified ROHS, CE & FCC, Protect devices from overheated and over-currents, overcharging, and short circuits, automatically detect the current required to match the iPhone device, Charging will automatically stop when the battery is full, ensuring a safe charging on the trip. The Built-in Premium Smart Chipset in 48W USB C Car Charger ensures the frequency is minimal that no more worrying about the interference of your radio or GPS.

⚡【2 Pack MFi Certified Lightning Cable】: Built-in high-purity copper core and intelligent chip, with overcharge protection, stable current protection, automatic switching, and battery protection, and can support up to 2.4A fast charging and 480 Mbps transfer speed. Using MFi Certified C94 Smart Chip. This MFi-certified cable is compatible with the following devices: iPhone 14/13/12/11/ Plus/Pro/Pro Max/Mini/SE 2020/XR/XS/XS Max/X 8 7 6 5, iPad, AirPods and more.

⚡【Smart IC Technology】: This 48W Dual Port USB-C and USB-A plug Built In Intelligent IC can auto-detect iPhone device connected in each port while also identifying the appropriate current to charge each of your iPhone/iPad device optimally，Provide a maximum of 3.0A/30W if a single PD 3.0 port is used and 6.0A/48W when dual ports are used simultaneously. Can charge your iPhone/iPad device 6 times faster, Charging efficiency is improved by 99%.

⚡【iPhone Car Charger Fast Charging】Portable USB C & A car charger fit for the Latest smartphones or tablets, iPhone 15(NOTE: Usb c to lightning cable that attached is not suitable for iphone 15 series)/14/13/12/11/Pro Max/Plus/Mini/SE/iPad Pro /iPad Air/iPad mini/Samsung Galaxy, etc. With 6X FASTER charging speed compared with 5V/1A, Provides a much more faster charging speed for your iPhone. The Ring LED indicator can help you to find the charging ports easily in the dark, Easily fits in a car cigarette Lighter socket with limited space.

⚡【High Quality, High Service】: MFi certified 2 Pack 48W Dual Port USB C Power Delivery All Metal iPhone Fast Car Adapter with 2x3ft Lightning Cable, convenient to charge your device on your travel, if you have any product questions, please get in touch with us anytime. Our service team will provide you with a satisfactory solution within 24 hours.
body.description: Fast Charging Dual Port Type C Car Charger for phone Adapter Charging two devices simultaneously Dual port car charge to any standard USB-C and USB-A device straight from your car's power outlet. Simultaneously charge your devices at full speed while you drive High Speed 20W PD and 18W QC 4.0 Fast Car Charge Tech charging charges your devices from 0% to 80% within 30 minutes, charging your phone at 6 times faster speed (Note: The above charge time is for reference only. The actual charging performance is subject to the battery remaining and various external factors) The Ring LED The Ring LED indicator can help you to find the charging ports easily in the dark, Easily fits in a car cigarette Lighter socket with limited space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality and Fast!
reviews.reviewText: This dual usb-c/usb-a cigarette lighter port works great! It is super fast, looks cool and unique from other chargers, and has multiple functionalities by being able to charge usb-c and usb-a as well. Super fast at the same time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Durable Rapid Car Charger Set
reviews.reviewText: I really like the look and durability of these chargers. Included is a pack of two car chargers and two charging cords that are a fast USB-C to lightning cable connections. My iPhone 13 Pro charged up very quickly. Each charger has two ports with the capability to charge one device with a USB-C connection and one with a USB-A connection. The chargers and cables are very sturdy and appear to be of high quality. Nice cool blue illumination is displayed on the charger when it is plugged in and powered on. I bought this because they have both the USB-C and USB-A connections for my charging needs. Great price point on this set as well. I highly recommended this car charger set!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Apple car charger
reviews.reviewText: This car charger works amazing. I found that it helped me get a 30% charge in less than 20 minutes from 11% on my XS phone. I use my phone a lot and this saved me from having a dead phone. The quality was great and it’s super colorful. Definitely happy with the way it works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought it to use it in my car and it is incredible, the charging is fast, the cable is not short and it is made of good material

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: When it comes to finding a car charger I looked everywhere. Searched on Amazon found the perfect one it comes with two chargers. It’s affordable and charges your phone fast.. the best purchased I made

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These chargers arrived quickly and work great. They are definitely high quality. I got them because they include both USB-A and USB-C connections. This works great for the variety of devices I need to power and charge in the car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought a few times before. Work great maybe a year then stop charging many times. For the price i wont complain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really great quality car charger + it’s super fast. Came in great packaging so I loved it!!
